mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan (plan_id, plan_day, attr_id) VALUES (plan_seq.NEXTVAL, #{day}, #{attrId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.plan_id, p.plan_day, p.attr_id, a.attr_name, a.attr_tag FROM plan p JOIN ATTR a ON p.attr_id = a.attr_id WHERE p.plan_day = #{day} AND p.attr_id = #{attrId} ORDER BY p.plan_id DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
